title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Diamond Aircraft DA62 - autopilot
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we to use the autopilot in a Diamon Aircraft DA62.

We will depart from Reykjavik Airport
(BIRK) Runway 13 and make a small flight where we will use the autopilot functionalities. After this we land again on runway 13 using the approach function of the autopilot. During the flight also the de-icing functionality of the aircraft is discussed which is critical when you fly in very cold air.
